parameters.name: CatalogName
parameters.description: The name of the data catalog.

parameters.name: DataRegion
parameters.description: The region where the data lake resides.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the updated table. If you do not need to update the table name, set the TableName and TableInput parameters to the same value.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

>  To view the ID of the tenant, go to the DMS console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see the [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.
